data.name: Cafe Maid - Hentai Edition
data.detailed_description:
In Cafe Maid - Hentai Edition your cafe makes money even while you are shaving or watching your favorite movies, and when you come back you can spend all that to make your cafe the biggest success around the globe.

Enjoy the cute 3D anime world and all your hot cutie employees who are eager to fulfill all your wishes.

Key Features

Manage the Cafe

Tap the girls to collect money, upgrade their tables so that they can entertain the guests even more and earn more money. After a time you will be able to automatize this process, freeing up your hands to do something else... for example to hire new maids to do new functions in the cafe, or to help them to provide special services to the customers in one of the back rooms.

Upgrade Your Company

When your current cafe is successful enough you can decide to sell it to another investor and get a big profit in return that you can spend on the girls or on managing your brand. Your decisions determine how much more efficiently will your next company earn money.

Rules, Tasks and Achievements

Every new cafe can provide new circumstances to beat and if you are looking for other challenges, accomplish the tasks and achievements that you get from the cuties.

Harem of 11 Maids

When you want to get intimate with one of the maids, ask them out and give them presents or fulfill tasks for them.

30+ Sex Scenes

Those who really deserve get all the private fun from the selected maids.

data.short_description: Make your own maid cafe brand the richest in the world. Cute 3D anime girls will help you to get to the top.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8
  • Processor: INTEL® CORE™ i3-8350K
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX9c compliant

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Nudity or Sexual Content, Adult Only Sexual Content, General Mature Content
